Class WgRectangle

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WgRectangle
Direct Known Subclasses:
WgColorRect, WgTextRect
public abstract class WgRectangle extends Object
Parent class for GUI operations with text and color rectangles in the WYSIWYG DMS Message Editor. Not to be confused with the text/color rectangle MULTI tag token parent class Wt_Rectangle. Note that most calculations in this class are done in WYSIWYG/image space.
Author:
Gordon Parikh - SRF Consulting

    • getResizeHandles

      public HashMap<String,Rectangle> getResizeHandles() throws NullPointerException
      Return the resize handles. makeResizeHandles must be called first, otherwise null will be returned.
